common.confirmDescription: These changes are irreversible. Do you want to proceed?

error.defaultDescription: An error occurred. Please try again later.
error.tooManyRequest: You have exceeded the request limit. Please wait for a while and try again.
error.noChange: You cannot update without making changes.
error.fetch: An error occurred while fetching the information. Please try again.

validation.whitespace: This field cannot start or end with space character
validation.phoneLength: Phone number must be 10 digits long
validation.specialChar: This field cannot contain special characters
validation.noNumbersOnly: This field cannot contain only numbers
validation.seatingCount: Only positive numbers with a maximum of 3 digits are allowed

login.title: Login
login.description: Please enter your email and password to continue.

error.incorrectCredentials: Incorrect email or password. Please try again.

forgot.title: Forgot password
forgot.description: Please use the verified email address associated with your account. We will send you a link to create a new password.
forgot.error: No account is registered with this email. Please check and try again.
forgot.success: The password reset link has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.

create.title: Create Your Password
create.description: Please create a new password. The password must be between 8 and 128 characters in length.
create.error: Your password reset request is invalid or has expired.
create.success: Your new password has been successfully created. You are being redirected to the login page.

application.rejectConfirm: Are you sure you want to reject this application?
application.approveConfirm: Are you sure you want to approve this application?

admin.title: Admin Registration Applications
admin.rejectTooltip: Application rejection reason must be at least 40 characters.

preliminary.title: Institution Admin Registration Preliminary Application Creation
preliminary.error: An error occurred while creating the preliminary application. Please try again.

completion.description: Please complete your admin registration application by entering your information.
completion.success: Your admin registration application has been successfully completed. After the necessary reviews, your application will be approved, and you will be able to log in to the system.
